src_original: 1. sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ caiva sābhāsaṃ parasaṃvide /  pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca sābhāsaṃ tv ātmasaṃvide //
tgt_original: sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ caiva sābhāsaṃ parasaṃvide |  pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca sābhāsaṃ tvātmasaṃvide ||-

src_original: 4. tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddheṇa viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ pratyakṣādyaviruddhaḥ /
tatraikadeśe 'mūrtatvam ākāśe pravartate na paramāṇau mūrtatvāt paramāṇūnam /
tgt_original: asyākāśaparamāṇvādiḥ sapakṣaḥ |  tatraikadeśa ākāśādau vidyate'mūrtatvaṃ na paramāṇau |

src_original: ghaṭasukhādir anityo vipakṣaḥ /
tatraikadeśe sukhādau vidyate na ghaṭādau //
yathā śabdo dharmī anityatvena viśeṇa viśiṣtaḥ sādhyate kṛtakatvād iti hetuḥ //
tgt_original: tadyathā |  anitye śabde sādhye ghaṭādiranityaḥ sapakṣaḥ ||

src_original: 5. kaḥ sapakṣaḥ /  sādhyadharmeṇa sāmānyena samānaḥ sapakṣo yathā ghaṭādir iti //
dṛṣṭāntābhāvād eva nānvayaniścayo nāpi vyatirekaniścaya iti saṃśayahetuḥ //  47. uktā nava ete 'naikāntikasaṃjñakā hetvābhāsāḥ //
48. viruddhasaṃjñako hetvābhāsaḥ kīdṛśaḥ //
49. yathā śabdo dharmī nitya iti sādhyo dharmaḥ kṛtakatvād ākāśādivat /
50. tathā śabdo dharmī nitya iti sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur ākāśādau sapakṣe nāsty eva /
tgt_original: tatra dharmasvarūpaviparitisādhano yathā |  nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvāddheti |

src_original: vipakṣaikadese ghaṭādau vidyate na vidyudādau //  etau dvau hetū dharmasvarūpaviparītasādhanau //
51. dharmaviśeśaviparītasādhano yathā /
cakṣurādaya iti dharmī parārthā iti sādhyo dharmaḥ saṃghatatvād iti hetuḥ /  mañcapīṭhādivad iti sapakṣavacanaṃ /
iti śāstrārthasaṃgrahaḥ //
9. tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvat /
tgt_original: tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvat |  yatra hetoḥ sapakṣa evāstitvaṃ khyāpyate |  tadyathā |

src_original: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ dṛṣṭam /  yathā ghaṭādiḥ /
asaty anityatve na bhavaty eva kṛtakatvaṃ yathākāśādau /
2. vādinā svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭo 'rthaḥ sādhyaḥ /  sādhyate yena tat sādhanam /
tgt_original: tatra pakṣādivacanāni sādhanam |  pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntavacanairhi prāśnikānāmapratīto'rthaḥ pratipādyata iti ||  tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddhaviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭatayā svayaṃ sādhyatvenepsitaḥ |  pratyakṣadyaviruddha iti vākyaśeṣaḥ |  tadyathā |  nityaḥ śabdo'nityo veti ||

src_original: yathā dhūmādir dharmībuddhimatā hetunā janyata iti sādhye /  pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ pakṣābhāsaḥ /

vedavākyaṃ dharmy apauruṣeyam iti sādhye /  prayatnānantarīyakatve śabdasya pauruṣeyatvasya prasādhanāt //  nānumānaṃ pramāṇam iti parapratipādanāya vacanam uccāryamāṇaṃ parārtham anumānam ity uktatvāt //
tgt_original: prasiddhasaṃbandhaśceti 9 ||  tatra pratyakṣaviruddho yathā |  aśrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti ||  anumānaviruddho yathā |  nityo ghaṭa iti ||  āgamaviruddho yathā |  vaiśeṣikasya nityaḥ śabda iti sādhayataḥ ||

src_original: śuci naraśiraḥkapālaṃ prāṇyaṅgatvāc chaṅkhaśuktivat //
3. hetos trirūpavacanam /  kāni punas tāni triṇi rūpāṇi /
18. aprasiddhaviśeṣyo yathā /
tgt_original: svavacanaviruddho yathā |  mātā me vandhyeti |  aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇo yathā bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati vināśī śabda iti ||

src_original: sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati ātmā cetana iti sādhayataḥ //
19. ubhayāprasiddho yathā /  vaiśeṣikasya bauddhaṃ prati sukhādisamavāyikāraṇam ātmeti
tgt_original: aprasiddhobhayo yathā |  vaiśeṣikasya bauddhaṃ prati sukhādisamavāyikāraṇamātmeti ||

src_original: pakṣe sattvam evety ekaṃ rūpam /  sapakṣa eva sattvam iti dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
tgt_original: pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣe cāsattvamiti |  kaḥ punaḥ sapakṣaḥ |

src_original: 37. yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvaṃ hetuḥ sapaksvipakṣayoḥ sarvatra vartamānaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikaḥ //  38. tathā śabdasya nityatve śrāvaṇatvaṃ hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayor apravartamānāt /
tgt_original: asādhāraṇaḥ śrāvakaṇatvānnitya iti |  taddhi nityānityapakṣābhyāṃ vyāvṛttatvānnityānityavinirmuktasya cānyasyāsaṃbhavātsaṃśayahetuḥ |  kiṃbhūtasyāsya śrāvaṇatvamiti ||  sapakṣaikadeśavṛttirvipakṣavyāpī yathā |

src_original: 39. tathā śabdasyāprayatnānantarīyakatve sādhye 'nityatvād iti hetuḥ /  sapakṣaikadeśavṛttir vipakṣavyāpy anaikāntikaḥ //  aprayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdasya vidyudākāśādiḥ sapakṣaḥ tatraikadeśe vidyudādau vartate 'nityatvaṃ nākāśādau prayatnāntarīyakaḥ punaḥ sarvo ghaṭādir vipakṣaḥ /
tgt_original: aprayatnāntarīyakaḥ śabdo'nityatvāt |  aprayatnānantarīyakaḥ pakṣaḥ |  asya vidyudākāśādiḥ sapakṣaḥ |  tatraikadeśe vidyudādau vidyate'nityatvaṃ nākāśādau |  aprayatnānantarīyakaḥ pakṣaḥ |

src_original: tatra sarvatra vartate //
tgt_original: asya ghaṭādirvipakṣaḥ |  tatra sarvatra ghaṭādau vidyate'nityatvam |  tasmādetadapi vidyuddhaṭasādharmyeṇanaikāntikam |  vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ sapakṣavyāpī yathā |

src_original: 40. tathā prayatnānantarīyakatve śabdasya sādhye 'nityatvaṃ hetuḥ ghaṭādau sarvatra vidyate /
tgt_original: prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdo'nityatvāt |  prayatnānantarīyakaḥ pakṣaḥ |  asya ghaṭādiḥ sapakṣaḥ |  tatra sarvatra ghaṭādau vidyate'nityatvam |

src_original: aprayatnānantarīyakaḥ punar vidyudākāśādir vipakṣaḥ /  tatraikadeśe vidyudādau vartate nākāśādau /
tgt_original: prayatnānantarīyakaḥ pakṣaḥ |  asya vidyudākāśādirvipakṣaḥ |  tatraikadeśe vidyudādau vidyate'nityatvaṃ nākāśādau |
